[[Marie]] (sister)}} '''Carlos''' is an employee at [[Allesandro's]]. He instantly disliked Monica and her becoming the new head chef. This is because the previous head chef, [[Emilio]] is his father. Also among the employees are his brother [[Tony (Allesandro's employee)|Tony]] and his sister [[Marie]]. Sometime later, he stops harassing Monica when he realizes he could get sacked if he continues.
